mapper.select: SELECT company_cd, seq, account_cd, customer_cd, date, classify, debtor, creditor, abs FROM statements ORDER BY seq ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO statements VALUES( #{company_cd}, #{seq}, #{account_cd}, #{customer_cd}, to_date(#{date},'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{classify}, #{debtor}, #{creditor}, #{abs}, #{ent_id}, NOW(), #{ent_prog}, #{mod_id}, NOW(), #{mod_prog})
